description: "This map shows the border between British India and Burmah (Myanmar). Although the Burmah part of the map is mostly blank, the Chindwin River is shown, along with some other details including a label stating ‘Low hills Covered with dense Forest’."
title: "Eastern Naga Hills and Manipur with adjoining portions of Burmah. [map] : Surveyed during the years 1872 to '74 & 1881-82."
